bow: mothers of reddit what gifts could one buy first time mom after she delivers was wondering what gifts moms appreciate after giving birth aside from the traditional things one would get at baby shower nothing like clothes or diapers for baby am not mom myself so do know what goes on with your body after giving birth heard something about cream for your nipples saw padsicles on pinterest lol are there certain things you ladies would have liked to receive for yourself also asking because my sister just told our family that she pregnant am super super thrilled and obviously way ahead of time in asking my question haha *edit the response from this subreddit has been abundantly great now have better understanding of what would comfort mother who just gave birth be it through her own time to catch some zzz nice relaxing herbal bath with candles clean house to come home to favorite snacks and big water bottle in reach easy prepped meals or yummy take out and things to help with baby uhm boppy just learned what the heck that was awesome obviously there was way more discussed in here and every single suggestion was definitely saved even though her journey just begun we all ca wait keep on rockin moms lt gave three of my friends lockets one actually returned the favor and gave me one too it gift for mom rather than baby and sweet that she can tuck baby photo inside when she delivers make her few dishes of food she can heat up she will be so busy and focused on baby and will need privacy swaddle blankets people like different brands but get the swaddleme ones are popular brand also huge fan of the aden amp anais muslin blankets boppy pillow amp rock and play by fisher price swings are fabulous but she will likely have these things on her registry she will get stuff from registry but wish someone just made or delivered us food when we got home congrats by the way someone got me comfy outfit to lounge around in and loved it like pjs gift certificate for house cleaner quality sleep mask http www amazon com kinzi trade dreamweave contoured sleep dp b013q837a2 ref=sr 15 ie=utf8 amp qid=1443929403 amp sr=8 15 amp keywords=sleep+mask is wonderful gift padsicles are awesome nipple cream hotpacks and those cooling gel nipple relief things are super useful also depends are soooo much better than those huge pads and mesh panties that you get in the hospital really loved when people bought me food this is great idea got my sister in law post partum kit with depends witch hazel epsom salt for baths newborn diapers breast pads and postpartum perineum spray this place has awesome stuff http www thebodybliss com bellybliss shtml good sized goodie box filled with hot chocolate packets or nice bag of their favorite coffee maybe candies and candles lotions or perfumes something little pampering little keepsake for the baby would be sweet with that also used an herbal sitz bath after my last two deliveries that felt beyond amazing and definitely helped with the downstairs soreness also if she breastfeeding big water bottle and basket of snacks is always welcome staying hydrated is big part of keeping up supply and was always ravenous while breastfeeding immediately post partum my sister came by and had bunch of cooked food that we could just heat and eat for few days boppy my bff made me pearl necklace it made me feel like real grown up old fashioned that way wear it nearly every day and babe loves to play with it if had had freezer meals all done fresh homecooked meals or gift certificate for take away would have been awesome if you live close chore coupons those first few months are tough so offerig to due dishes load of laundry ot anything else is quite helpful as for padsicles used my cotton reusable pads slathered with aloe vera gel so comfy nipple cream typcially lanolin barely used since we had good latch removed someone to clean her house while she out having the baby so it nice and perfect when she brings baby home also someone to come help the first couple weeks that does just want to hold the baby helps lot someone to wash dishes and bottles clean up and take out trash shop and remind mom to eat think lost 18lbs the first two weeks after left the hospital because was so busy with her and never remembered to eat clean dishes laundry easily reheated foods was given frozen casseroles and pies nap this god yes remember my husband getting home from work and being like wtf do you mean it dinner time did your just leave for work like an hour ago also my sister would come over and give my dogs little attention have and needles to say the first few weeks as first time mom they felt little neglected she would take them outside play for bit make sure they had fresh foods and water and just cuddle with them for while back rub foot rub time away from baby everything else is infinitely less valuable bought one first time couple tummy tub during the pregnancy it turned out she had heard of them and was already interested so that worked beautifully they also make great buckets to soak stuff or lego tubs later on for another friend who has just had her second bought her bulk box like 12 full size packets of wipes special eco kind that is twice the price of normal wipes but absolutely amazing on skin they are just water and aloe vera even if she decided she did like them for her kid though she loves them her baby was getting bright red from the regular wipes they are great for just using as general cleaning cloths and wipes eg in the kitchen other things some professional cleaning sessions meal delivery service know that most relatives and friends swamp with the usual baby gifts to the point where the couple do even get to choose the things they would like so lean towards the practical and the disposable useable if you want to get clothes buy six months or larger and preferably 1y 12 months and up many babies hit that size before year they may be swamped with clothes again on their first birthday and it so lovely and useful to have nice new piece of gifted clothing then things wish had slippers that are easy to slip on wear sandals in the house just from being on my feet night cream or some sort of shower treats because you feel and look like hell tomboy and would love some hampering at this point everyone mentions food we had frozen stuff given to us and it awesome but for mom fast snack foods that are healthy to munch on at any point in the day or night my general go to suggestion is this food something to eat right away and another to eat later time take the baby while she goes to shower nap of both clean never ever leave without having cleaned something do ask just do dishes in the sink wash them clean laundry in the hamper fold it stuff piled on the counter stack and organize it crumbs on the floor vacuum it does matter what you do anything helps with the new baby and do forget she will need your help in few months too and again after that keep coming to help every mom know with kids of all ages always appreciate food and chance to shower yes this six ish weeks in one twin home and the other in the nicu still and any pampering and happy adult conversation or half an hour break is great if you re going to give food use those tray things that can just be tossed instead of having to worry about washing and returning them paper plates and plastic utensils too to make clean up after eating easier this cd of lullabies from around the world http www amazon com dreamland world lullabies soothing songs dp 1587590719 was by far one of the best gifts received when my first was born both my kids slept to it every night for years and are great sleepers and still play it now and again when sleep think it depends on the person very private and sonewhat introverted and would have gotten the pleasure intended out of either cleaning service or someone dropping in pre cooked dinners for me additionally would have liked anyone doing dishes etc when they called over but that just me perhaps your friends works love that however love food and thoroughly enjoy big hamper of unpasteurised cheeses and cured meats and gift card for sushi delivery other neat gifts included sling groegg room thermometer lovely grobag and also voucher for massage ooh will look this up thank you wonderful definitely did think of this but it makes sense as sure sleeping is much more meaningful now hehe thank you oooh girl sushi delivery feel you on that one room thermometer would have never thought thank you for your suggestions ah so these padiscle things work ll definitely have to put together kit for her nice comfy pj set thank you yes the amount of times woke my husband up because wanted cold water with ice while baby was nursing at 3am are far too many to count try to find one that is spill proof and keeps water cold for longer then 12 hrs loved mine yes sadly live in different state than her but this makes lot of sense and sure professional can do it better than me anyway thank you great idea snack type food or meals thank you aww brilliant my sister does wear jewelry much but when does it meaningful pieces to her this would mean so much wonderful idea thank you true indeed live in different state than her so wo be able to be there lot but pamper time will happen when get there if she wants it haha great suggestions candles and coffee great combo thank you pie ok so frozen casseroles is great idea do live in the same state as her but when get there my game plan is to now cook some food buy her favorites to freeze you re about the 4th person to suggest food so clearly this is important business would have never thought about food honestly so thank you for this great suggestion big package of favorite candy great for small energy boost when you are getting up to feed every hrs gt so lean towards the practical and the disposable useable definitely ll look up this tummy tub great advice on baby clothes btw thank you slippers someone else suggested pj set or comfy clothes so now got whole outfit going on for her hehe ah snack foods thank you honestly yes and yes to everything you said so excited to meet this baby when visit live in different state ll make sure to ask her if she wants to take breather from baby to nap or shower thank you saved that link thank you ah was going to ask about gift cards to restaurants ll definitely find few places they like to get food from what lovely bff you have btw thank you for your suggestions do know what this is but it sounds cool and ll look it up thanks swaddle blanket ll look into that someone else suggested boppy too so it must be good thank you gt someone to come help the first couple weeks that does just want to hold the baby helps lot true but wan na just hold the baby haha no understand and ll definitely be helping out when can at this point from all the suggestions got ll definitely be making her snack basket frozen foods and getting restaurant gift card or two from her favorite places she wo be losing any weight haha thank you my first response too also prepaid dogwalker if they have dogs the summer infant velcro swaddles are great husband and tried swaddling with regular blankets for while and our daughter would always break out of them started using the velcro ones and she almost never got her arms out just have to make sure they re snug and not high enough to go over their face when they re tiny newborn gift cards are great too we got couple to one of our favorite local takeout places sam club gift card target kroger they re really nice if they re tight on cash after one of my best friends had her baby she and her husband joked that the price of admission to see the baby was food have given birth yet but say some from column and some from column but nothing that would require ton of prep no prob best of luck momma did have clean house when brought baby home really wish spent the 100 150 keep in mind that not everyone gives birth vaginally or breastfeeds after had baby craved fruit and greek salads but was more than happy with take out by the time baby comes she ll probably have everything she needs for the baby focus on gifts specifically for her have an almost two week old and have really appreciated people that came over with meals specifically ones with veggies since it hard to have fresh veggies on hand also really love my husband hydro flask water bottle http www hydroflask com hydration always stuck on chair nursing which makes me super thirsty this water bottle is super well insulated so can put ice water in it and 12 hours later still have ice water within reach the idea of pampering gifts like pj shelf stable snacks to keep around the house and slippers are also great but would wait for anything like sitz bath or padcicles actually heard that newborn diapers cut open and filled with ice work better until you know how your sister delivers she might end up with section in which case neither of those would be necessary anything grab able when baby is fussy granola bars fruit packs apples etc are what lived on the first few weeks when my guy was velcro baby no prep foods are magix also second the house cleaning voucher those first few weeks things slip badly because she ll be so exhausted and busy with baby she wo have time to clean or she ll clean when she should be sleeping if you re thinking for mom haircut from her favorite place too you feel so blah and dumpy after birth that something to perk you up about your looks is great editing for final thought comfy yoga pants pjs etc she ll live in them absolutely was on hospital bed rest for month before giving birth to my son hired some cleaning ladies to come clean before came home and it was the best decision ever if she planning on breastfeeding you could make her lactation cookies and send them to her my sister made me some and they were so good the best part is that she does have to share them with anyone http www food com recipe oatmeal chocolate chip lactation cookies by noel trujillo 192346 yessss food especially if mama is breastfeeding breastfeeding makes me so hungry lol my most kindly received gift ever given was bag of soak salts bath bombs face masks sugar scrubs lotions and breastfeeding things like lanolin and soothie pads and mother milk tea she cried while opening it saying that she had never received so many things to take care of herself with it important for new moms to remember that in order to provide the best for their children they must provide the best for themselves first neck pillow ca tell you how much used still use it while nursing saved me tons of neck pain definitely noted great idea reader for when you re stuck under baby you ca turn pages of traditional book with one hand nor can you let it go and have it stay on the page what want is really soft beautiful luxe robe but not one that ll be hot cause post partum hormones are nuts and turn me into walking furnace pajamas that have top easy to breastfeed in are also great to have before doing anything food related would make sure there are no food allergies dietary restrictions have friend who is allergic to basically everything it is shaped pillow it hugs your waist that way when you re sitting down with baby to nurse bottle feed or cuddle your arms are already propped up with pillow after baby out grows that stage you can put it behind baby when they re learning to sit up they re tipsy and fall into the pillow if they fall back or to either side
